			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>
<script id="addGameTpl" type="text/template">

    <form class="add-game" role="form">

        <div class="form-group row">
          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="platform">Platform</label>
          <div class="col-sm-9">
            <select class="form-control" name="platform">
              <option value="default">Select a platform</option>
              {{#each platforms}}
                <option value="{{id}}">{{name}}</option>
              {{/each}}
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="form-group row">
            <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="game-title">Game Title</label>
            <div class="col-sm-9">
              <input class="autocomplete-game form-control" id="name" name="name" class="form-control" type="text" placeholder="Start typing a game title...">
              <div class="invalid-feedback">
                Make sure a platform is selected first.
							</div>
            </div>
            <input type="hidden" name="game" value="0">
        </div>

      <div class="form-group row">

          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="lastplayed">Last Played Date</label>

              <input name="lastplayed" type="text" class="datepicker form-control">

          </div>

    </div>

        <h3 class="listing"><span>History</span></h3>

        <div class="row">
        </div>
    </div>

  </form>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

    <span class="help-block">
        <p>Set a display name to be used across the site.</p>
        
        <p><strong>Note:</strong> You'll still use your current username to login, but 
        users will see this name instead when viewing your profile or gamercard.</p>
    </span>
    <div class="form-group">
      <input id="displayname" class="form-control" name="displayname" type="text" placeholder="Enter display name">
    </div>

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
  </form>
</script>

  <div class="edit-panel" style="display: none">

<script id="editGameTpl" type="text/template">

	<h3>{{title}}</h3>
	
	<p style="display: none" class="form-text text-muted message-verification">The features below require verifying your account. Your account is currently not verified.</p>

    <form class="edit-game" role="form">

      <div class="form-group row form-lastplayed">

          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="lastplayed">Last Played</label>

          <div class="col-sm-9">
             <input name="lastplayed" type="text" class="datepicker form-control" disabled>

            <p style="display: none" class="form-text text-muted">Enter a custom last played time. Only values greater than the tracked time will apply.</p>
          </div>

      </div>

      <div class="form-group row form-playtime">

          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="playtime">Hours Played</label>
          <div class="col-sm-9">
            <input name="playtime" type="text" class="form-control">

			<div style="display: none" class="playtime-input-fields">
				<label class="checkbox-inline mt-3">
				<input type="checkbox" name="use_tracked_time" id="useTrackedTime"> Use tracked time
				</label>

				<p class="form-text text-muted">This game's playtime is automatically tracked. If you wish to enter a custom value uncheck the box above, but be aware this will override the tracked value.</p>
			</div>
          </div>

      </div>

      <div class="form-group row form-completion">

          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="completion">Completion Date</label>

          <div class="col-sm-9">
            <input name="completion" type="text" class="datepicker form-control" disabled>

            <p style="display: none" class="form-text text-muted">If you've completed this game, enter a time here.</p>
          </div>

      </div>


      <div class="p-4 col-sm-12">

        <label class="checkbox-inline form-toggle-hide">
		  <input type="checkbox" name="privacy_level" id="inlineCheckbox1" class="toggle-hide"> Hide game on profile page
        </label>
      </div>

      <input type="hidden" name="environment" value="{{env}}">
      <input type="hidden" name="gameid" value="{{gameid}}">

      <div style="clear: both"></div>

    </form>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>
